insert into user_base (user_name, mobile_phone, nick_name, `type`, `status`, create_time, modify_time) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user_base set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, mobile_phone, nick_name, `type`, `status`, create_time, modify_time from user_base
